sentences.en: A letter of introduction will ensure you an interview.
sentences.cn: 凭一封介绍信准保会接待你.

sentences.en: Generally, a book has an introduction.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 书都有绪论.

sentences.en: He encouraged the introduction of new medical treatments.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励采用新的医疗方法.

sentences.en: He is best remembered for the introduction of the moving assembly-line.
sentences.cn: 他最为人铭记的创举是率先采用流水装配线。

sentences.en: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.cn: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

sentences.en: Introduction of electronic point-of-sale systems is improving efficiency.
sentences.cn: 引进销售点电子系统提高了效率。

sentences.en: Mary was shy at her introduction to the company.
sentences.cn: 在向公司介绍自己时,玛丽感到胆怯.

sentences.en: Millions of words have been written about the introduction of the euro.
sentences.cn: 有关采用欧元的文章已经有很多。

sentences.en: On balance, the book is a friendly, down-to-earth introduction to physics.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，这是一本通俗而务实的物理入门书。

sentences.en: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.cn: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.en: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.cn: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.en: The book is a friendly, down-to-earth introduction to physics.
sentences.cn: 这是一本简明、实用的物理学入门书。

sentences.en: The book's introduction is brief.
sentences.cn: 该书的引言简短.

sentences.en: The camera has undergone only two minor tweaks since its introduction.
sentences.cn: 那款相机自从推出以来仅经过两次小的改进。

sentences.en: The introduction attempts to yoke the pieces together.
sentences.cn: 导言部分试图将各部分硬拼凑在一起。

sentences.en: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.cn: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.en: the introduction of new manufacturing methods
sentences.cn: 新制造方法的采用

sentences.en: the introduction of new technology into the workplace
sentences.cn: 把新技术引进工厂

sentences.en: The introduction tells you how to use the book.
sentences.cn: 引言告诉你怎样使用这本书.

sentences.en: The rabbit is a relatively recent introduction in Australia.
sentences.cn: 兔子是相对较新引入澳大利亚的物种.

sentences.en: There are two among their recent introductions that have greatly impressed me.
sentences.cn: 他们最新引进的产品中有两件给我留下了深刻的印象。
